Description: Saudi Company for Hardware (known as: Saco) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since May 2015. Saco operates within the Retailing sector focusing on Specialty Stores. Saco is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in November 1985.

Shareholder Name: Abdul Mohsen Ibrahim Abdulaziz Al Touq
